Description.Name: Mech Bay 2
Description.Details: â€¢ A second 'Mech can be repaired simultaneously at 50% efficiency The repaired power conduits allow six more 'Mech cubicles to be powered up and made available. This also brings more of the Mech Bay's automated systems online, making Yang's job easier.

AssignedCastDescription: We've got a lot of extra space in here, Commander. It's just full of junk and pirate garbage, and half of the bulkheads are missing. I could pull my engineers off 'Mech duties and we could get another six 'Mech bays online. Just say the word.
